name: Grauzone Festival

config_properties.name: Grauzone Festival
config_properties.description: A post-punk and darkwave festival in The Hague, Netherlands, featuring underground and alternative artists.

ai_profile:
**Grauzone Festival 2026: A Celebration of Alternative Sounds**  

The Grauzone Festival 2026 brings together an eclectic lineup of 70 artists, showcasing a rich tapestry of alternative and underground genres. Darkwave, post-punk, electronic, and techno take center stage, with notable contributions from synthpop, industrial, and experimental music. This year’s festival continues its tradition of exploring the darker, more avant-garde corners of the music world, offering a sonic journey that spans from ethereal soundscapes to pulsating dance beats. With an average artist rating of 8.03, the lineup promises a high-caliber experience for attendees.  

Diversity is a defining feature of Grauzone 2026, with artists hailing from over 17 countries, including France (13 acts), the USA (16 combined acts from the US and United States counts), and the Netherlands (9 acts). The festival also features a commendable representation of gender identities, with male, female, mixed-gender, and non-binary artists contributing to the program. Additionally, 10 artists identify as people of color, further enriching the cultural mosaic of this year’s lineup.  

With 11 DJs adding to the energy and a mix of both rated and unrated acts, Grauzone 2026 promises a dynamic blend of established names and emerging talent. The festival’s commitment to celebrating diversity and innovation ensures a unique experience for fans of boundary-pushing music. Whether you're drawn to the haunting allure of darkwave or the pulsating rhythms of techno, Grauzone 2026 is set to be a must-attend event for alternative music lovers around the globe.
